Name: Flag Sweeper
About the game: This is a two player version of minesweeper where rather than avoiding the mines, the objective is to hit the mines. The first player to hit 26 mines wins. It's turn based. When hitting a mine you get to go again. I call it Flag Sweeper. Queue up in a public lobby or play with friends by hosting/joining
